text: The candidate in each single-member district receiving the highest number of votes cast in such election shall be declared the winner, except that in the case of a tie the procedures set forth in § 1-1001.10(c) shall govern.
historical:

1973 Ed., § 1-171f.

Legislative History of Laws

For legislative history of D.C. Law 1-21, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 1-309.01.

DC CODE § 1-309.07

Current through December 11, 2012

heading.catch_text: Advisory Neighborhood Commissions--Determination of election winners.
